channel.title: Android on I Prefer Jim
channel.description: Recent content in Android on I Prefer Jim

item.title: Android Studio and Library Projects
item.description: This is basically a quick brain-dump post. I have previously attempted to get into Android application development, but with only 8-10 hours of “free” time per month, it was difficult to get traction with an app before the goog machine overhauled everything.
